title: Grandma Barbieri's Chocolate Fudge
steps: In a microwave, cook chocolate and milk in a ^large microwave-safe bowl$ on high (2-3 minutes). Or until chocolate is almost melted. Stir halfway between the melting of the chocolate.
Stir until the chocolate is completely melted. Stir in vanilla (and optionally marshmallows or nuts).
Refrigerate 2 hours or until firm. Cut into squares.
